title: Staub Ceramic Garlic Keeper - Basil
features: Highly impact and thermal shock resistant
description: The elegance and functionality of Staub ceramics goes from freezer to oven to table. The glass porcelain finish matches Staub's cast iron to mix perfectly on your table top. Oven and broiler safe up to 572F, ceramics can also be used in the microwave and are dishwasher safe. Highly scratch, impact, and thermal shock resistant.
